_sText:
Laser canon =] MUAHAHHAHAH!!! Have fun. Its pretty good =] its a one shot kill... or 2 or 3 shot kill =[ And different color lasers :) Hope you all like.

I allow editing as long as credit is given to me and you. Credit has to be given where dued. If you use it in a map. Credit needs to be given. I hope you all enjoy.

Also theres the .bsp ... try it out as a little test. I've beaten it, its not too hard. Not too easy. Good Luck.

Also if you have a request for a map or pre-fab thats easy... or need help, feel free to message me. Thanks!
